snippet: Mr. Hoffman’s body was discovered by a friend around 11:30 a.m. in the fourth-floor apartment at 35 Bethune Street, which he rented as an office.
abstract: Investigators at scene of actor Philip Seymour Hoffman's death discover at least two plastic envelopes containing what appears to be heroin and five empty envelopes at scene in his Greenwich Village apartment, leading them to assume Hoffman died of drug overdose.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hoffman’s body was discovered by a friend around 11:30 a.m. in the fourth-floor apartment at 35 Bethune Street, which he rented as an office.

headline.main: Philip Seymour Hoffman Said to Be Found With Syringe
headline.print_headline: Actor’s Body Said to Be Found With Syringe
